mbanking.title: Mobile Banking BRI
instructions: Log in to your BRI mobile banking account and enter your PIN
Select “Add Virtual Account” or enter your 16-digit payment code
Enter the amount to be paid and your mobile banking PIN
Take a screenshot of the confirmation screen or save the payment notification for your records.
instructions_id: Login ke rekening mobile banking BRI Anda dan masukkan PIN
Pilih “Tambah Virtual Account” atau masukkan 16 digit kode pembayaran Anda
Masukkan jumlah yang akan dibayarkan dan PIN mobile banking Anda
Ambil tangkapan layar layar konfirmasi atau simpan notifikasi pembayaran untuk catatan Anda.

ibanking.title: Internet Banking BRI
instructions: Log in to your BRI internet banking account and enter your user ID and password
Select “Add Virtual Account” or enter your 16-digit payment code
Enter the amount to be paid and your internet banking PIN
Take a screenshot of the confirmation screen or save the payment notification for your records.
instructions_id: Login ke rekening internet banking BRI Anda dan masukkan user ID dan password Anda
Pilih “Tambah Virtual Account” atau masukkan 16 digit kode pembayaran Anda
Masukkan jumlah yang akan dibayarkan dan PIN internet banking Anda
Ambil tangkapan layar layar konfirmasi atau simpan notifikasi pembayaran untuk catatan Anda.

transfer.title: ATM BRI
instructions: Log in to your BRI mobile/Internet banking account and enter your user ID and password
Enter the account number and amount to be transferred
Verify the account details and amount
Take a screenshot of the confirmation screen or save the payment notification for your records.
instructions_id: Login ke rekening mobile/Internet banking BRI Anda dan masukkan user ID dan password Anda
Masukkan nomor rekening dan jumlah yang akan ditransfer
Ambil tangkapan layar layar konfirmasi atau simpan notifikasi pembayaran untuk catatan Anda.
